item.title: Consultants Are Like Avocados
item.description: Do you think consultants are useless? Think again! ðŸ™Œ My latest article is a Friday-perfect, lighthearted counterpoint to Steve Jobs’ grumbles about consultants. Get ready to change your mind! Steve Jobs on Consultants? Hold My Latte All right, let’s be honest. We all love Steve Jobs - the vision, the turtleneck, the whole deal. But when it came to consultants, the guy could beâ€¦well, a little harsh. He famously tossed shade, saying stuff like consultants don’t own solutions, and their expertise is all theoretical book-smarts.
